text: Vadim Iosifovich Mulerman (; 18 August 1938 – 2 May 2018) was a Soviet singer (baritone). He was awarded the title of Meritorious Artist of the RSFSR (1978), People's Artist of the RSFSR and Merited Artist of Ukraine.Интервью с Мулерманом Mulerman died on 2 May 2018 in New York City of cancer at the age of 79. ==References== ==Other websites== * Интервью изданию «Зеркало недели» Category:1938 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Soviet singers Category:Cancer deaths in New York City
title: Vadim Mulerman
